title: Volcanic Eruption In Indonesia Kills 6
content: At least six people died after a volcano in eastern Indonesia erupted several times overnight, officials said Monday, raising the alert level to the highest of a four-tiered system.
summary: At least six people died after a volcano in eastern Indonesia erupted several times overnight, officials said Monday, raising the alert level to the highest of a four-tiered system.

title: Donald Trump Is "Clearly Better Choice" Over Kamala Harris: Nikki Haley
content: Former US president Donald Trump is 'clearly the better choice,' as compared to his Democratic rival Vice President Kamala Harris, former US ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley has said.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump is 'clearly the better choice,' as compared to his Democratic rival Vice President Kamala Harris, former US ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley has said.

title: Dollar Dips As US Election Outcome Remains Uncertain, Fed Rate Cut Looms
content: The dollar slipped in Asia on Monday as investors braced for a potentially pivotal week for the global economy as the US chooses a new leader and, probably, cuts interest rates again with major implications for bond yields.
summary: The dollar slipped in Asia on Monday as investors braced for a potentially pivotal week for the global economy as the US chooses a new leader and, probably, cuts interest rates again with major implications for bond yields.

title: US Presidential Election 2024: Know Your Candidates
content: Republican former President Donald Trump will face Vice President Kamala Harris in a Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election.
summary: Republican former President Donald Trump will face Vice President Kamala Harris in a Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election.

title: "Deeply Disappointing": Canada Temple Attack Disrupts India Consular Camp
content: Shortly after a violent attack on a Hindu temple in Canada's Brampton, the Indian High Commission in Ottawa said a consular camp was being held near the temple and added that it was "deeply disturbing" that such "disruptions" are being allowed
summary: Shortly after a violent attack on a Hindu temple in Canada's Brampton, the Indian High Commission in Ottawa said a consular camp was being held near the temple and added that it was "deeply disturbing" that such "disruptions" are being allowed

title: US Woman Arrested For Attempting To Sell Her Newborn Baby On Facebook
content: The Texan woman is currently being held in the Harris County Jail on a $30,000 bond and has been charged with a felony.
summary: The Texan woman is currently being held in the Harris County Jail on a $30,000 bond and has been charged with a felony.

title: NDTV Analysis: Elon Musk, Donald Trump And World's Largest MAGA Megaphone
content: In July 2022, Elon Musk suggested Donald Trumpt "hang up his hat and sail into the sunset." Fast forward a couple of years and Mr Musk now holds the world's largest megaphone with Make America Great Again (MAGA) printed on it.
summary: In July 2022, Elon Musk suggested Donald Trumpt "hang up his hat and sail into the sunset." Fast forward a couple of years and Mr Musk now holds the world's largest megaphone with Make America Great Again (MAGA) printed on it.

title: Donald Trump Rhetoric Darkens, Kamala Harris Vows Gaza Peace
content: Kamala Harris courted voters angered by the Gaza war while Donald Trump doubled down on violent rhetoric with a comment about journalists being shot as the tense US election campaign headed into its final hours.

title: Devotees Attacked At Canada Hindu Temple, Justin Trudeau Reacts
content: Upholding the right to practice religion "freely and safely", Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called the violence at a Hindu temple near Toronto "unacceptable".
summary: Upholding the right to practice religion "freely and safely", Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called the violence at a Hindu temple near Toronto "unacceptable".

title: 'Indulge In Paneer': JD Vance Speaks About Adopting Indian Vegetarian Food

title: "If Kamala Harris Wins, She Would Open Border, Allow Migrants": Trump
content: Just days before the presidential election, former US President Donald Trump rallied in Kinston, North Carolina, and targeted Vice-President Kamala Harris by saying that "if elected, Harris would open the border, allowing an influx of migrants, gangs

title: Trump Remark On 2020 Poll Sparks Fear He May Not Accept Result If He Loses
content: The United States will on Tuesday witness one of the closest presidential elections in decades with Donald Trump and Kamala Harris making last ditch efforts to sway the remaining undecided voters in key battleground states.

title: Study Reveals Possible Link Between Depression And Higher Body Temperature
content: A UCSF study involving 20,880 people across 106 countries has found a possible connection between depression and elevated body temperatures.
summary: A UCSF study involving 20,880 people across 106 countries has found a possible connection between depression and elevated body temperatures.

title: Angry Crowds Throw Mud And Shout Insults At King During Flood Damage Tour
content: On Sunday, King Felipe VI visited Paiporta, Spain, to assess damage from unprecedented flash floods that have claimed over 200 lives.

title: Battleground Breakdown: What You Need To Know About The 7 Swing States
content: "Swing states" - the elephant in the room is the major decider of the United States presidential election. Also known as battleground states, these states can make or break any candidate.

title: India Wants To Grow With World: EAM Jaishankar
content: Addressing the Indian community here, Mr. Jaishankar said: "India will grow. India is growing, but India wants to grow with the world."

title: India And China Made 'Some Progress' In Disengagement, Says S Jaishankar
content: India and China have made "some progress" in disengagement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Sunday, describing the development as a "welcome" step.

title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump Race Against Time In Final Swing State Push
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump began a frantic last push across US swing states Sunday, with less than 48 hours of campaigning left to secure a decisive edge in a bitterly fought and historically close presidential election.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump began a frantic last push across US swing states Sunday, with less than 48 hours of campaigning left to secure a decisive edge in a bitterly fought and historically close presidential election.

title: Watch: Harris Makes Surprise Appearance On SNL As Election Heats Up
content: Vice President Kamala Harris made a surprise appearance on "Saturday Night Live" just days before the election, playing herself alongside Maya Rudolph's impression of her.
